thread.title: Watch The Feud: Bette and Joan Trailer
thread.title_full: Watch The Feud: Bette and Joan Trailer

title: Watch The Feud: Bette and Joan Trailer
text:
Ryan Murphy’s Feud is looking just as campy as you might’ve expected, hoped, or possibly feared. The first installment in a planned anthology series , Bette and Joan centers on the legendary behind-the-scenes (and occasionally onscreen) battles between Bette Davis and Joan Crawford as they tried to revive their careers by starring in Whatever Happened to Baby Jane? Murphy repertory player Jessica Lange plays Crawford, while Susan Sarandon is the imperious Davis. The show also features Alfred Molina, Stanley Tucci, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Judy Davis, Kiernan Shipka (a.k.a. Sally Draper), and Alison Wright (Martha from The Americans lives!). Feud: Bette and Joan premieres on FX on March 5. Start mixing your martinis now.
